```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Load packages:
```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(fivethirtyeight)
data(police_killings)
```


```{r}
list <- c("Firearm", "Knife", "No")
killings_filtered <- police_killings %>%
  filter(armed %in% list)

ggplot(killings_filtered, aes(x=raceethnicity, fill = gender)) +
  geom_bar() +
  facet_wrap(~armed) +
  theme(axis.text.x=element_text(angle=90,hjust=1,vjust=0.5)) +
  xlab(NULL) +
  ylab("# of Killings")
```
